name: chainsensors-v1
description: ChainSensors V1 - Sensor data marketplace on Solana

scripts.arcium:build:devnet: mkdir -p build && cd chain_sensors && arcium build && cp build/*.arcis ../build/ && cd ../build && for f in *.arcis; do cp "$f" "${f%%.arcis}_devnet.arcis"; done
scripts.program:build: npm run arcium:build:devnet && cd chain_sensors && anchor build
